name: Dark Age Of Camelot
description: Official Live Server Version of Dark Age of Camelot.
notes: Patcher will download gamefiles on first startup.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Dark Age of Camelot/camelot.exe

content:
files:
- setup: https://darkageofcamelot.com/sites/daoc/files/downloads/DAoCSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Dark Age of Camelot/camelot.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing DAOC
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
